snippet.title: Angelic Waves - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Bus Arrows Studios' very own visual novel video game!

An dating sim, rom-com visual novel with character development, love moments, drama and... you're dating an angel girl in secret?!

Join the MC's unique love quest of choosing three girls to date, and see how you and chosen girl will grow together.

Coming on Monday 1st November 2021!

Here's the platforming links:
Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1715660/Angelic_Waves/

Itch:
https://bus-arrows-studios.itch.io/angelic-waves

Thank you. 

#visualnovel #steam #itch
